name: self-hosted-gateway
tagline: A WireGuard based gateway for securely exposing services
description: Selfhosted-gateway is a Docker-native tunneling solution that exposes local containers to the public internet via a remote WireGuard gateway. It automates reverse proxy setup with NGINX/Caddy and TLS, ideal for securely publishing homelab services.

features.title: Application Gateway
features.description: Expose and route access to self-hosted services

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Restrict access to services using authentication rules

features.title: Service Routing
features.description: Route incoming requests to internal services

features.title: Configuration Files
features.description: Define gateway behavior using configuration files

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the gateway on your own infrastructure
